title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: When using the New Package Wizard in a Java project, the message displayed is confusing.
OB: When attempting to create a new package in a Java project using the New Package Wizard, the message displayed is unclear and may lead to confusion.
EB: When creating a new package in a Java project using the New Package Wizard, the message should provide clear instructions and guidance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java project.
2. Select the project.
3. Attempt to create a new package using the New Package Wizard.
